field_descriptions.question: Question that can be answered by yes or no (max 128 characters)
field_descriptions.deadline: ISO string date when question becomes open to reporting
field_descriptions.description: Detailed terms and conditions for your question
field_descriptions.question_id: Id of the question that concerns your action
field_descriptions.outcome: Answer for a question: yes or no
field_descriptions.initial_coeff: (optional - default: 1.5) coefficient applied to the reward that determines amount the first reporter has to stake
field_descriptions.counterstake_coeff: (optional - default: 1.5) coefficient applied to to the opposite side stake that determines amount required to reverse the outcome
field_descriptions.commit: Create result datafeed and pay initial reporter
field_descriptions.withdraw: Withdraw a gain. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.address: Withdraw a gain for another address than yours
